DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure KI67 Measurement Positive Cell Count Result
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The outcome of lab tests to determine the amount of Ki-67 positive cells present in a sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Ki67 Measurement Positive Finding Cell Count
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The determination of the amount of Ki-67 protein present in a sample._A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism._A procedure to determine the number of cells in a sample. Also used to mean the result of such a procedure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Ki67 Measurement Positive Finding Cell Count
Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of Ki-67 protein present in a sample.:A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:A procedure to determine the number of cells in a sample. Also used to mean the result of such a procedure.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the amount of Ki-67 protein present in a sample.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
A procedure to determine the number of cells in a sample.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of Ki-67 protein present in a sample._The result of an action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

Concepts.definition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ki-67 Positive Cells Greater than 20 Percent

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ki-67 Positive Cells Greater than 20 Percent
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A semi-quantitative microscopic finding indicating that more than 20 percent of the cells in sample are detected following staining using an anti-Ki-67 antibody.

Concepts.longName: Ki-67 Positive Cells Greater than 20 Percent
Concepts.definition: A semi-quantitative microscopic finding indicating that more than 20 percent of the cells in a sample are detected following staining using an anti-Ki-67 antibody.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A semi-quantitative microscopic finding indicating that between 10 and 20 percent of the cells in sample are detected following staining using an anti-Ki-67 antibody.

Concepts.definition: A semi-quantitative microscopic finding indicating that between 10 and 20 percent of the cells in a sample are detected following staining using an anti-Ki-67 antibody.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Ki-67 Positive Cells Less than 10 Percent

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Ki-67 Positive Cells Less than 10 Percent
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A semi-quantitative microscopic finding indicating that less than 10 percent of the cells in sample are detected following staining using an anti-Ki-67 antibody.

Concepts.longName: Ki-67 Positive Cells Less than 10 Percent
Concepts.definition: A semi-quantitative microscopic finding indicating that less than 10 percent of the cells in a sample are detected following staining using an anti-Ki-67 antibody.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of Ki-67 protein present in a sample.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the amount of Ki-67 protein present in a sample.
